function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Dependence on decision maker preferences for resilience values","Impact":"Inconsistent resilience measurements and strategies for mitigating the impact of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Incorporate objective resilience properties such as rapidity, robustness, redundancy, and resourcefulness into the resilience metric","Technologies":"Resilience measurement and modeling technologies","People":"Research institutions, healthcare organizations, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, policy makers, public health officials"},{"Description":"Probabilistic approach for assessing resilience","Impact":"Uncertainty in the assessment of resilience and potential underestimation of the impact of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Validate the probabilistic approach with empirical data and consider the wide range of disease propagation scenarios","Technologies":"Simulation and modeling tools, data analytics for disease spread","People":"Researchers, public health officials, decision makers","Owner":"Research institutions, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Quality of service as a measure of resilience","Impact":"Limited understanding of resilience in the context of contagious diseases and potential oversight of critical factors","Mitigation":"Incorporate specific disease-related factors and healthcare system dynamics into the quality of service measure","Technologies":"Healthcare data analytics, disease spread modeling","People":"Healthcare professionals, public health officials","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, public health agencies"}]}
